name: Alone at the Island
description:
You ended on an island because a strange underwater event that you will have to discover by your own. To survive, cut down trees, chop stone, build huts, bonfires ...

Will you discover why did you end there?

*Este juego está disonible en Español y en Inglés* *This game is avaliable in English and Spanish* WARNING:

The controls of the game aren´t explained in it, to see them, you must go to the pause menu and click on the "controls" button.

You also have them here below:

Move: W-A-S-D or Arrows (+Shift = Run)

Look Around: Mouse

Jump: Space

Eat: C

Take pills: V

Open / Close the backpack: M

Get / Stock the torch: F

Interact: Left Click

Use equipped item: Right Click
